column1: This appeal is preferred against the Judgement, delivered by the learned  Trial Judge of the
High Court of Colombo, dated 16.11.2018, by which, the accused-appellant, was convicted
and  sentenced  to  10  years  rigorous  imprisonment  and  Rupees  Twenty  Thousand  fine  in
default  06  months  simple  imprisonment  and  Rupees  Seven  Hundred  and  Fifty  Thousand
compensation in default 18 months rigorous imprisonment.
